trans-unit.source: Represents the exception thrown when an event provider publishes invalid data in an event.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den undantag uppstod när en händelseprovider publicerar ogiltiga data i en händelse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException"></xref> class by specifying the error message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException"> </xref> klass genom att ange ett felmeddelande som beskriver det aktuella undantaget.

trans-unit.source: The error message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Felmeddelandet som beskrivs i det aktuella undantaget.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException"> </xref> klass med serialiserade data.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objekt som innehåller det serialiserade objektdata om undantag genererades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objekt som innehåller detaljerad information om käll- och målservrar.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException"></xref> class with an error message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException"> </xref> klass med ett fel meddelande och det interna undantaget.

trans-unit.source: The error message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Felmeddelandet som beskrivs i det aktuella undantaget.

trans-unit.source: The Exception instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Den instans som undantag som orsakade det aktuella undantaget.
